snippet: The merger would be the latest in the payments industry as companies around the world continue to move toward e-commerce of all types.
abstract: Global Payments announces it will buy Heartland Payment Systems for about $4.3 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The merger would be the latest in the payments industry as companies around the world continue to move toward e-commerce of all types.
